name: SpacExterm
description:
UPDATE:

-added in player firing

-Got textboxes and sound

-For the time being, I have an infinite enemy spawner to give people to do in my game, nothing exciting though.

Next time this game is updated there will be a lot more stuff to do!

I hope you enjoy!

If you have and issues or suggestions please feel free to tell me at. www.bryancoxgames.tumblr.com.
